t: What were some of the challenges Amazon faced in its early years?
s: In its early years, Amazon faced several challenges. One of the main challenges was the skepticism and lack of trust from consumers towards online shopping. Additionally, Amazon had to deal with the logistical challenges of storing and shipping a wide variety of products.
